pages.text: Albino ball pythons lack the pigment melanin.$(br)$(li)Head: Red eyes and a yellow patch on the top.$(li)Body: Same pattern as the normal morph, except the dark brown is replaced with white and the light brown with yellow.$(li)Belly: white.

pages.title: Albino
pages.text: Type: Recessive$(funfact)Albino was the first morph to be bred in captivity.$()
